body_html:
I was looking to reduce ATen's dependence on TH* and move a heavily depended on part of THC to ATen to support additional refactoring.

What alternative were you thinking of? Maybe we can incorporate it?

body:
I was looking to reduce ATen's dependence on TH* and move a heavily depended on part of THC to ATen to support additional refactoring.

What alternative were you thinking of? Maybe we can incorporate it?
